page.title: 12Religion in N/Ham/Coll P
page.content: There are nineteen churches in the North Hammersmith area.Most of these are in Shepherds Bush.We found that most churches were in run down areas and housing estates.Four of these churches had modern architecture while the others looked very old. The main church is the Church of England(C.E). There are quite a few of these churches in the area.There are a couple of Catholic churches.This is probably due to a large Irish community in the area. There is also a Baptist church and an Orthodox church with a mainly Greek congregation.There is also a synagogue in North Kensington for those of the Jewish faith.Although there are many Moslems and Hindus living in the area we saw no sign of their places of worship.
